title: USA’s Answer to Tom Boonen? Luke Lamperti Poised to Prove Classics Credentials in Rookie Season
content:
'I’ve had the chance to show and prove I do belong here': USA's criterium king steps up to WorldTour with Quick-Step in 2024.

Read the full article at USA’s Answer to Tom Boonen? Luke Lamperti Poised to Prove Classics Credentials in Rookie Season on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
